name: Milfy City
storyline: You play as a student who has a lot of sexual fantasies. You're in the school, and you just woke up from the dream. Your school's therapist Judy put you in the sleep, so you could recall everything what happened yesterday. There are a lot of things you should be ashamed of, but who cares?!
summary: Milfy City is an adult Visual Novel where you play as a young student who finds himself in the school therapist office, after a humiliating moment with another teacher at school. While plotting his revenge, he'll romance other characters at the school and at home.​
